content:
From: Victor Porton <porton@narod.ru>
I am going to write and publish article "Generalization in ZF" which takes the
well known informal concept of generalization and formalizes it in ZF. I am
going to attach an Isabelle theory as an appendix to the article.

Which math logic journal you would recommend?

\--
Victor Porton - http://portonvictor.org

From: Victor Porton <porton@narod.ru>
That journal is not open access. It seems (confirm?) that they even would require me to remove a preprint from my own Web site. That's not good. I will search for an other journal.
